scripts.setup: mkdir -p data/books data/newsletters data/roadmaps data/prospectus && node -e "require('./server.js').initDataFiles()" && touch data/one_on_one.json data/group_access.json data/prospectus.json data/newsletter.json && echo '[]' > data/one_on_one.json && echo '[]' > data/group_access.json && echo '[]' > data/prospectus.json && echo '[]' > data/newsletter.json
